entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:43 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -24.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 1:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -24.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
